import React from "react"; import "./Styles/Home.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useContextHook } from "../Providers/ContextProvider"; const Home = () => { const buttonStyles = { height: "150px", }; const { userData, schoolName, isLogin } = useContextHook(); return ( <>

Welcome {userData.fName}, to My School Student Data management App.

{schoolName}

Where you can manage your Data of Students Easily and fast.

); }; export default Home;
